nodes.text: The Wodes were an octopedal sentient species native to a planet with a gravitational pull twice that of the galactic standard. When traveling to worlds with lesser gravities, the Wodes took very heavy steps, unaccustomed to their lighter weight. During the Clone Wars, in which the Galactic Republic fought against the Confederacy of Independent Systems, the Wodes were liberated by the Republic general, Solomahal, a member of the Lutrillian species. In 2 BBY, a number of Wode were present on the planet Bonadan at the same time that the smuggler Han Solo was there investigating a slaving ring.
The Wodes were created by Brian Daley for his novel Han Solo's Revenge, published by Del Rey in 1979.
